title: For all practical purposes. On size and shape. 3
creator_credit: COMAP, Chedd-Angier Productions and Olga Rakich
brief_description: It grows and grows explores the mathematical concept of geometric growth, by looking at compound interest, and how to calculate the maximum sustainable yield of fish. The program discusses limiting values, reproduction curves, population pyramids and explains the formulae used for calculating these.
